message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is the most likely category as the paper describes the development of a system that interacts with users to teach them sign language. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is also likely as the system uses video analysis to recognize signs. 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is relevant as the system provides verbal feedback to users. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is relevant as the system uses machine learning algorithms to recognize signs. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is relevant as the system involves the use of recorded videos.
